text:
Added the following lines to the conf file and the server hangs on AIX 5.2 when
navigating to a URL.  Remove the RewriteRule and it works fine.

RewriteEngine on
RewriteCond %{REQUWEST_METHOD} ^TRACE
RewriteRule .* - [F]
creator: richp6767@yahoo.com

text:
Please be more specific than "hangs".  Is there anything in the logs?
Have you tried the RewriteLog with RewriteLogLevel 9?  Does mod_rewrite
work with other configurations.

By the way, REQUEST_METHOD is misspelled.
creator: slive@apache.org
trawick@apache.org
text:
If the web server hangs (does not respond to new requests) on AIX, you can use
the script at 

http://www.apache.org/~trawick/aixthrdbt.pl

as follows to get backtraces of all threads in all children, which is usually
sufficient to find the nature of the hang.

# ./aixthrdbt.pl -p PARENT-PROCESS-ID

This will use dbx (must be found in PATH) to get backtraces of all children of
the parent (includes piped loggers, which can cause the server to hang too),
creating a bunch of files called

   backtraces.PID1
   backtraces.PID2
   backtraces.PID3
   ...

tar and gzip these up and attach to the PR.

no response in a number of months to request for more doc; please re-open if you
can provide doc on the hang
creator: trawick@apache.org
